title: Episode 19: Sara Martin's Deconstruction Journey
description:
Today I talk with Sara Martin about her journey into deconstruction and where she is now. So grateful she was willing to share her story with me and I hope we can talk again. If you're interested in learning more about Sara's story click the link below. 

Sara Martin's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC49ikLIIIwWj74BySg9M8OA
